contract which pulls reserve assets from PCV Deposits in order to exchange FEI at $1 of underlying assets with a fee. `mint()` - buy FEI for $1 of underlying tokens `redeem()` - sell FEI back for $1 of the same The contract is a OracleRef - to determine price of underlying, and RateLimitedReplenishable - to stop infinite mints and related DOS issues Inspired by MakerDAO PSM, code written without
